sentence.Network_en: The sheer size of the cathedral is a constant reminder of the power of religion.
sentence.Network_cn: 大教堂的宏大规模使人时刻领略到宗教的威严。

sentence.Network_en: These ruins are an eloquent reminder of the horrors of war.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些废墟形象地提醒人们不要忘记战争的恐怖.

sentence.Network_en: I have had another reminder from the library.
sentence.Network_cn: 我又收到图书馆的催还单.

entry.tran: 提示;使人回忆起某事的事物
entry.def: Something that serves as a reminder of another thing makes you think about the other thing.

example.ex: The British are about to be given a sharp reminder of what fighting abroad really means...
example.tran: 有些事将很快让英国人清楚意识到海外作战究竟意味着什么。

example.ex: Violence has broken out in the capital, a stark reminder that the religious tensions are refusing to go away.
example.tran: 首都爆发了暴力事件，这给了人们一个严酷的提醒——宗教紧张局势还在持续。

entry.tran: 缴费单;催缴单;催缴通知
entry.def: A reminder is a letter or note that is sent to tell you that you have not done something such as pay a bill or return library books.

example.ex: ...the final reminder for the gas bill.
example.tran: 最后一次煤气催缴通知单

means.word_mean: 1. a message that helps you remember something;
2. an experience that causes you to remember something
3. someone who gives a warning so that a mistake can be avoided

auth_sentence.content: Hajj is a reminder that life is a journey.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hajj is a reminder that life is a journey.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hajj is a reminder that life is a journey.

auth_sentence.content: This week we had a reminder of the danger.
auth_sentence.res_content: This week we had a reminder of the danger.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This week we had a reminder of the danger.

auth_sentence.content: There is not one reminder of the abuse that happened.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is not one reminder of the abuse that happened.

means.word_mean: 令人回忆起…的东西, 提醒…的东西

sentences.en: a reminder of what you have to do or say
sentences.cn: 提醒人该做什么或说什么的提示

sentences.en: I have had another reminder from the library.
sentences.cn: 我又收到图书馆的催还单。

sentences.en: It always took a final reminder to get her to pay her share of the rent.
sentences.cn: 总是得发给她一份最后催缴通知，她才付应该交的房租。
